headline: Sonitor and Tagnos Announce Strategic Merger, Paving the Way for Enhanced Healthcare Technology Solutions
summary: OSLO, Norway & SAN JOSE, Calif., August 19, 2025--Sonitor completes a merger with Tagnos, uniting market-leading RTLS and workflow software to drive growth and advance real-time healthcare operations.

raw.headline: Sonitor and Tagnos Announce Strategic Merger, Paving the Way for Enhanced Healthcare Technology Solutions
raw.summary: OSLO, Norway & SAN JOSE, Calif., August 19, 2025--Sonitor completes a merger with Tagnos, uniting market-leading RTLS and workflow software to drive growth and advance real-time healthcare operations.

headline: Indianapolis Colts Team Up with Zebra Technologies for Real-Time Player Performance Insights
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., August 19, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, has announced a new collaboration with the NFL’s Indianapolis Colts. This season, Zebra will implement its state-of-the-art RFID tracking technology to monitor player and ball data during Colts’ practice sessions, enabling insights that enhance game strategies, evaluate player performance, and ensure player health and safety.
